according to import-export data Vietnam
continues to increase imports of meat and
meat products while domestically, pork prices are
still falling and purchasing power has not
improved  Particularly for frozen pork products
in October, Vietnam imported 14.4 tons.
This is the sixth consecutive month the amount of
imported pork increased compared to the previous 10 months of
2023. Frozen pork imports
reached 95.4 tons worth
239  9 million USD increased by 7 minutes in volume and
26.1 minutes in value, although
pork imports continuously increased, but only accounted for
about 2.1 minutes compared to
domestic pork production in November 2023.
Pig production across the country is in a
downward trend because purchasing power in the market has not yet shown
signs of recovery. According to Dr. Nguyen
Thanh Son, Chairman of the
Vietnam Poultry Association, vipa, the trade deficit of
meat products has two main causes.
Firstly, the cost of livestock production is quite high so it

and winning the price, making farmers extremely

More than 48,000 hectares of seeds have been planted so far,
14,000 hectares have been harvested, this year's yield is very good
about approx.  7 tons of dry rice yield
nearly 100,000 tons at a price of 6400 VND M kg of

export market has begun to recover,

so productivity has increased to meet
market demand.  Bringing high profits

This issue in the US is still not being

survey participants said it is important to have
a leader who addresses the
concerns of Asian Americans, according to
the survey by the
US-based Pill Research Center.  Conducted with
7,006 Asian adults from
July last year to January this year,
researchers recorded 17 forms of
discrimination including having their names
mispronounced and receiving poorer service than
other customers.  or being called
derogatory names About 9 in 10
Asian Americans have experienced at least one
type of discrimination More than
half of Asian adults
report experiencing four forms of discrimination
78 minutes of respondents
said they were treated like foreigners,
even those of Asian descent whose
families have lived in the US for generations.
Nearly 6 out of 10 Asian adults had similar experiences.
Thanh said

country at the 28th conference taking place in

space of dome machines. These are
pollution cocoons that simulate air quality
in three cities.  around the world, thereby

Beijing in China. Inside there are also

it.  That in each area the dome machines
help explain the source of pollution in
each city. For example, London is
mainly polluted by traffic so there will be
a lot of nitrogen dioxide gas, while
pollution in Beijing and New  Daily is a
mixture of construction dust, industrial emissions
and biomass burning, among
other things. According to those who do, two-thirds of
air pollution comes from the
burning of fossil fuels. So
what countries do  Measures

stopped.  Waiting for a while when the ES5 train running

onto the tracks. The victim was sucked by the train. Van was

railway staff discovered  The motorbike
